name: aquamarine
content:
aquamarine noun
(STONE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] a greenish-blue stone used in jewellery: Fantastic diamonds, pearls, rubies, emeralds and aquamarines are insured for thousands of pounds. Stones including topaz, lapis lazuli, and aquamarine can be bought loose or set in jewellery.
Nastya22/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

aquamarine noun
(COLOUR)
[ U ] a greenish-blue colour: Wooden villas are painted in shades of aquamarine and lime. This shimmery eyeshadow comes in aquamarine and lilac.

aquamarine adjective
(STONE)
made of or containing a greenish-blue stone used in jewellery: I got an aquamarine pendant for my birthday. She was wearing diamond earrings and a large aquamarine ring.
More examplesFewer examplesa silver chain with aquamarine crystalsThe collection includes a pair of rose-cut diamond and aquamarine drop earrings.

aquamarine adjective
(COLOUR)
of a greenish-blue colour: Her aquamarine eyes carefully watched every movement her brothers made. the aquamarine waters of the Florida Keys
More examplesFewer examplesShe wore a black trouser suit and aquamarine nail varnish.an aquamarine blue oceana man in aquamarine pantsThey danced under aquamarine disco lights.
